verses.name: Psalms 18:6
verses.text: In my distress I called upon the Lord, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears.

verses.name: Psalms 18:7
verses.text: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.

verses.name: Psalms 18:8
verses.text: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.

verses.name: Psalms 18:9
verses.text: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
